text: @realDonaldTrump You are such a simple minded idiot. His aggressive lockdowns worked to flatten the that curve. NO THANKS TO YOU DIMWIT! But for the actions of governors like @GovInslee and @NYGovCuomo this crisis would be far worse. Your delays created a large part of the #COVID19 crisis. #IDIOT
